Title: Episode 9
Plot:
MI-5 is put in charge of protecting Niko Grecic, the former right-hand of Tezlia, a Serbian who is put on trial for war crimes.

They know that Richard Dempsey, a former MI-6 agent who turned on them, is looking for Grecic to kill him before he can testify. Adam, Jo and Zafar must protect Grecic at all costs.
GuestStars: Jay Villiers,  Michael Maloney,  Marcel Iures,  James Dicker,  Janet Spencer-Turner,  Gugu  Mbatha-Raw,  Alec Newman,  James Greene,  Lucy Scott,  Maisie Dimbleby,  William Key,  Biddy Wells
